title: Can I not pray funeral prayer of my aunt who is sufi, not believes in hell heaven... assim al hakeem
transcript: accept Allah uh my question is okay I had a discussion with my aunt who is so knowledgeable and she spent all of her life reading books the wrong ones anyway long story short she believes in Allah but she loves Sophia she says there is no Hell Fire no Jannah we will not go back to life after we die there is no Kiama there is no shaytan in Abu Bakr in the um okay so what's your question I decided not to pray Janessa on her and not to make Dua for her if she dies first insha Allah am I right yes you're right she's not a Muslim okay thank you
